leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 数值相对论与宇宙尺度计算物理生态
leaf_cluster.typical_objects: 时空度规/曲率, 引力波波形, N-body/LSS, 宇宙学网格场
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 建模→高精仿真→波形/统计→推断→benchmark
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 专用仿真器 + 波形/后处理 + 推断/采样 + HPC

unit.unit_name: 数据管理、可视化与benchmark（cosmo专用）

queries: [WEB] large scale structure analysis pipeline github

tools.name: Exo-Striker
tools.one_line_profile: Transit and radial velocity interactive fitting tool for orbital analysis and N-body simulations
tools.detailed_description: The Exo-Striker is a Python-based tool designed for the analysis of exoplanetary orbital parameters. It offers interactive fitting for transit and radial velocity data, incorporating N-body simulations to model multi-planet systems and assess dynamical stability.

tools.name: zCluster
tools.one_line_profile: Galaxy cluster photometric redshift measurement tool
tools.detailed_description: A package developed by the ACT Collaboration for measuring photometric redshifts of galaxy clusters using data from large public surveys. It is designed to handle multi-band photometry and provide redshift estimates critical for cosmological analysis.

tools.name: GraphClust-2
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for structural clustering of RNA secondary structures
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for clustering RNA sequences based on their secondary structures. It utilizes graph kernel methods to group RNAs with similar structural features, aiding in the identification of non-coding RNA families.

tools.name: dlwp-hpx
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning Weather Prediction on the HEALPix mesh
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for global weather prediction that utilizes the HEALPix mesh for spherical data representation. It enables efficient training of weather models on spherical geometries, avoiding distortions common in rectangular grids.

tools.name: healpix-geo
tools.one_line_profile: HEALPix implementation for geo-sciences
tools.detailed_description: A Python library adapting the HEALPix pixelation scheme specifically for geo-scientific applications. It provides tools for handling spherical data on Earth's surface, facilitating data integration and analysis in earth observation and geodesy.

tools.name: EXP-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for cosmological and external simulation analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utility tools developed by the EXP-code group for analyzing cosmological N-body simulations. It includes scripts for data conversion, initial condition generation, and analysis of simulation outputs.

tools.name: lm-evaluation-harness
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for few-shot evaluation of language models
tools.detailed_description: A widely used framework for evaluating the performance of large language models (LLMs) on a variety of tasks. While general-purpose AI, it is a critical research tool for benchmarking models used in scientific NLP and AI4S applications.

tools.name: hera_pspec
tools.one_line_profile: HERA power spectrum estimation code
tools.detailed_description: A library for estimating the power spectrum of radio astronomy data, specifically developed for the Hydrogen Epoch of Reionization Array (HERA). It includes tools for data preparation, power spectrum estimation, and uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: Healpix.jl
tools.one_line_profile: HEALPix library written in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia implementation of the HEALPix (Hierarchical Equal Area isoLatitude Pixelization) library. It provides functions for pixelating the sphere, which is essential for analyzing cosmic microwave background (CMB) and other spherical astronomical data.

tools.name: HBTplus
tools.one_line_profile: Subhalo finder and merger tree builder
tools.detailed_description: HBT+ (Hierarchical Bound-Tracing) is a code for finding subhalos and building merger trees in cosmological N-body simulations. It tracks particles over time to robustly identify substructures and their evolution history.

tools.name: CLMM
tools.one_line_profile: Cluster Lensing Mass Modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing galaxy cluster mass reconstruction from weak lensing observables. Developed by the LSST Dark Energy Science Collaboration (DESC), it provides a standardized framework for modeling cluster lensing profiles.

tools.name: WeakLensingDeblending
tools.one_line_profile: Weak lensing fast simulations and analysis of blended objects
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for simulating and analyzing weak lensing effects in the presence of blended galaxy images. It addresses the challenge of overlapping sources in deep sky surveys, providing methods for deblending and shear estimation.

tools.name: descqa
tools.one_line_profile: Validation framework for mock galaxy catalogs
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed by LSST DESC for validating mock galaxy catalogs against observational data and theoretical expectations. It provides a suite of tests to ensure simulated catalogs are realistic and suitable for cosmological analysis.

tools.name: healsparse
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse representation of HEALPix maps
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for handling sparse HEALPix maps, allowing for efficient storage and manipulation of high-resolution spherical data where large portions of the sky are empty or unobserved. Useful for large-scale survey footprints.

tools.name: HealpixMPI.jl
tools.one_line_profile: MPI-parallel implementation of Healpix in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library that provides an MPI-parallelized implementation of the HEALPix tessellation scheme. It enables distributed processing of massive spherical datasets on high-performance computing clusters.

tools.name: Mera.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tool for astrophysical simulation data in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package designed for the analysis and visualization of astrophysical simulation data (e.g., from RAMSES). It provides high-level functions to load, process, and inspect large-scale hydrodynamic and N-body simulation outputs.

tools.name: swiftsimio
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for reading and analysing SWIFT cosmological simulation data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library dedicated to reading and analysing data produced by the SWIFT simulation code. It leverages unyt for unit handling and h5py for efficient I/O, providing a pythonic interface to massive cosmological datasets.

tools.name: TOPMed Analysis Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis pipeline for TOPMed whole-genome sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline developed by the UW Genetic Analysis Center for the Trans-Omics for Precision Medicine (TOPMed) program. It handles the processing and analysis of large-scale genomic datasets.

tools.name: abacusutils
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for Abacus N-body simulation halo catalogs and data products
tools.detailed_description: Python code designed to interface with halo catalogs and other data products from the Abacus N-body simulations. It facilitates the reading, manipulation, and analysis of large-scale structure data.

tools.name: NNhealpix
tools.one_line_profile: Neural networks on the HEALPix sphere
tools.detailed_description: A library for implementing neural networks on spherical data using the HEALPix pixelization scheme, specifically designed for Cosmic Microwave Background (CMB) analysis.

tools.name: Py-SPHViewer
tools.one_line_profile: SPH particle rendering and visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: A framework for rendering cosmological simulations in Python using the Smoothed Particle Hydrodynamics (SPH) scheme. It allows for high-quality visualization of particle data.

tools.name: Local Volume Database
tools.one_line_profile: Database of local volume dwarf galaxies and star clusters
tools.detailed_description: A curated database containing information on dwarf galaxies and star clusters within the Local Volume. It serves as a reference dataset for near-field cosmology and galactic archaeology.

tools.name: Mangrove
tools.one_line_profile: GNNs for regressing baryonic properties from dark matter merger trees
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning tool that uses Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) to predict baryonic properties of galaxies directly from full dark matter merger trees, enabling rapid generation of galaxy catalogs from dark matter simulations.

tools.name: astropy-healpix
tools.one_line_profile: HEALPix implementation for Astropy
tools.detailed_description: A BSD-licensed implementation of the HEALPix discretization scheme for Astropy. It provides high-level and efficient tools for handling spherical data in astronomy.

tools.name: Halotools
tools.one_line_profile: Package for studying large scale structure and galaxy evolution
tools.detailed_description: A specialized Python package for building and testing models of the galaxy-halo connection, and analyzing catalogs of dark matter halos. It supports N-body simulations and semi-analytic models.

tools.name: ClusterPyXT
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for X-ray temperature maps of galaxy clusters
tools.detailed_description: A software pipeline designed to generate X-ray temperature maps of galaxy clusters. It processes observational data to produce spatially resolved temperature distributions.

tools.name: nbodykit
tools.one_line_profile: Massively parallel analysis kit for large-scale structure datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for analyzing large-scale structure (LSS) data from cosmological simulations and surveys. It uses MPI for massive parallelism and supports a wide range of algorithms for correlation functions and power spectra.

tools.name: scida
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable analysis tool for large astrophysical datasets
tools.detailed_description: An analysis tool designed for large scientific datasets, particularly in astrophysics and cosmology. It supports particle-based and mesh-based simulations as well as observational data, leveraging Dask for scalability.

tools.name: cds-healpix-java
tools.one_line_profile: Java implementation of the HEALPix library
tools.detailed_description: The Java implementation of the HEALPix library developed by the Centre de Données astronomiques de Strasbourg (CDS). It provides efficient spatial indexing and manipulation of spherical data.

tools.name: cds-healpix-python
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for the CDS HEALPix library
tools.detailed_description: Python package providing bindings to the CDS HEALPix library. It enables efficient HEALPix operations in Python, optimized for performance.

tools.name: cds-healpix-rust
tools.one_line_profile: Rust implementation of the HEALPix library
tools.detailed_description: A Rust implementation of the HEALPix library by CDS, offering high-performance spatial indexing for spherical data, with support for WebAssembly.

tools.name: mocpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for Multi-Order Coverage (MOC) maps
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to create, manipulate, and visualize Multi-Order Coverage (MOC) maps. MOCs are used to describe arbitrary sky regions and coverage in astronomy.

tools.name: GetDist
tools.one_line_profile: MCMC sample analysis and plotting tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for analysing Monte Carlo Markov Chain (MCMC) samples and generating plots. It is widely used in cosmology for parameter estimation and posterior analysis.

tools.name: HERMES
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for line-of-sight integration and sky map generation
tools.detailed_description: A computational framework designed for line-of-sight integration over galactic radiative processes. It generates sky maps in the HEALPix-compatible format, useful for cosmic ray and astrophysical emission studies.

tools.name: pypower
tools.one_line_profile: Power spectrum and window function estimation tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for estimating power spectra and window functions, essential for analyzing large-scale structure in cosmological surveys.

tools.name: profiley
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for calculating profiles of galaxies and clusters
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to perform profile calculations for galaxies and galaxy clusters, facilitating the analysis of astrophysical structures.

tools.name: pyproffit
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of X-ray brightness profiles from galaxy clusters
tools.detailed_description: A Python code for the analysis of X-ray surface brightness profiles of galaxy clusters, enabling the extraction of physical properties from observational data.

tools.name: healpix_util
tools.one_line_profile: Python utilities for working with HEALPix maps
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python tools and utilities for manipulating and analyzing HEALPix maps, commonly used in cosmology and astrophysics.

tools.name: smatch
tools.one_line_profile: Spherical point matching using HEALPix scheme
tools.detailed_description: Code to efficiently match points on a sphere using the HEALPix indexing scheme, useful for cross-matching astronomical catalogs.

tools.name: JoXSZ
tools.one_line_profile: Joint X-ray and SZ data fitting for galaxy clusters
tools.detailed_description: A Python code for the joint fitting of X-ray and Sunyaev-Zel'dovich (SZ) effect data to constrain the physical properties of galaxy clusters.

tools.name: preprofit
tools.one_line_profile: Pressure profile fitter for galaxy clusters
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to fit pressure profiles of galaxy clusters, supporting analysis of thermodynamic properties.

tools.name: rcosmo
tools.one_line_profile: R package for Spherical, HEALPix and CMB data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package for handling and analyzing spherical data, HEALPix grids, and Cosmic Microwave Background (CMB) data.

tools.name: PySM 3
tools.one_line_profile: Sky emission simulations for CMB experiments
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for generating full-sky simulations of Galactic foreground emission and Cosmic Microwave Background (CMB) fluctuations.

tools.name: cWGAN-GP
tools.one_line_profile: Generative adversarial network for galaxy property simulation
tools.detailed_description: A conditional Wasserstein Generative Adversarial Network with gradient penalty (cWGAN-GP) designed for the stochastic generation of galaxy properties in wide-field surveys.

tools.name: CausticMass
tools.one_line_profile: Caustic mass estimation code for galaxy clusters
tools.detailed_description: A Python code for estimating the mass of galaxy clusters using the caustic technique, which utilizes the escape velocity profile.

tools.name: halomod
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for the Halo Model of structure formation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python package for calculating the halo model of large-scale structure, including power spectra, correlation functions, and halo occupation distributions.

tools.name: REBOUND
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-purpose N-body integrator
tools.detailed_description: An open-source multi-purpose N-body code for collisional dynamics, widely used in planetary science and astrophysics for simulating orbital dynamics.

tools.name: healpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for HEALPix
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to handle pixelated data on the sphere using the HEALPix pixelization scheme, essential for CMB and wide-field survey analysis.

tools.name: cosmoped
tools.one_line_profile: Compressed CMB likelihood code using MOPED
tools.detailed_description: A code implementing the MOPED compression scheme to compress the Planck power spectrum for efficient cosmological parameter estimation.

tools.name: heracles
tools.one_line_profile: Harmonic-space statistics on the sphere
tools.detailed_description: A Python code for computing harmonic-space statistics on the sphere, useful for analyzing cosmological fields.

tools.name: benchmark-field-level
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for field-level cosmological inference
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite for evaluating field-level cosmological inference methods using galaxy survey data.

tools.name: QuickSip
tools.one_line_profile: Project Survey Image Properties onto Healpix maps
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to project survey image properties (e.g., seeing, sky noise) onto HEALPix maps, aiding in the analysis of systematics for surveys like DES.

tools.name: HEALPix (Java)
tools.one_line_profile: Java implementation of HEALPix
tools.detailed_description: A Java library implementing the HEALPix pixelization scheme for astronomical sphere pixelization, featuring range tree improvements.

tools.name: pynkowski
tools.one_line_profile: Compute Minkowski Functionals for fields
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to compute Minkowski Functionals and their expected values for different fields, used in topological analysis of cosmological data.

tools.name: mbproj2d
tools.one_line_profile: Multiband projection code for galaxy clusters
tools.detailed_description: A code for fitting 2D images of galaxy clusters across multiple bands, allowing for thermodynamic profile extraction.

tools.name: cluster-lensing
tools.one_line_profile: Galaxy Cluster and Weak Lensing Tools
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for calculating galaxy cluster properties and weak lensing signals, including mass-concentration relations and NFW profiles.

tools.name: CONCEPT
tools.one_line_profile: COsmological N-body CodE in PyThon
tools.detailed_description: A massively parallel cosmological N-body code written in Python, designed for large-scale structure simulations.

tools.name: Zeno
tools.one_line_profile: N-body/SPH simulation and analysis environment
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive software environment for N-body and SPH (Smoothed Particle Hydrodynamics) simulations and analysis, used in galactic dynamics.

tools.name: eagleSqlTools
tools.one_line_profile: Python API for interacting with the EAGLE cosmological simulation database
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to facilitate SQL queries and data retrieval from the EAGLE (Evolution and Assembly of GaLaxies and their Environments) cosmological simulation database, enabling efficient analysis of large-scale galaxy formation data.

tools.name: GoFish
tools.one_line_profile: Fisher forecast tool for DESI galaxy clustering
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight and user-friendly Python tool for performing Fisher matrix forecasting specifically tailored for the Dark Energy Spectroscopic Instrument (DESI) galaxy clustering surveys, aiding in cosmological parameter estimation.

tools.name: VizAly-Foresight
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for scientific data compression
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite developed by LANL for evaluating compression algorithms on scientific datasets, supporting data management and visualization workflows by assessing compression efficiency and performance.

tools.name: DIF
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic Index Facility for HTM and HEALPix in MySQL
tools.detailed_description: A facility providing Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) and HEALPix indexing capabilities for MySQL and MariaDB databases, enabling efficient spatial indexing and querying of astronomical datasets.

tools.name: healpixviewer
tools.one_line_profile: OpenGL-based viewer for HEALPix maps
tools.detailed_description: A simple, modern OpenGL application for visualizing HEALPix-based cosmological sky maps, allowing researchers to inspect spherical data structures interactively.

tools.name: m4opt
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Mission Multi-Messenger Observation Planning Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed for planning observations across multiple missions and messengers (gravitational waves, neutrinos, electromagnetic), optimizing scheduling and coverage for astrophysical events.

tools.name: ltu-cmass
tools.one_line_profile: Modular simulator for CMASS-NGC galaxy clustering
tools.detailed_description: A modular simulation tool for generating mock catalogs and simulating galaxy clustering specifically for the CMASS-NGC sample, aiding in the analysis of large-scale structure data.

tools.name: Corrfunc
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance correlation function calculator
tools.detailed_description: A fast, OpenMP-parallelized library for calculating spatial correlation functions (clustering statistics) on the CPU, widely used in cosmology for analyzing galaxy surveys and simulation data.

tools.name: exptool
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tools for N-body models using Basis Function Expansions
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for analyzing N-body simulations, focusing on Basis Function Expansions (BFE) and perturbation theory to study galactic dynamics and potential fluctuations.

tools.name: healpix-js
tools.one_line_profile: HEALPix implementation in JavaScript/TypeScript
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript/TypeScript implementation of the HEALPix (Hierarchical Equal Area isoLatitude Pixelization) algorithm, enabling web-based visualization and manipulation of spherical cosmological data.

tools.name: LibHealpix.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia wrapper for the Healpix library
tools.detailed_description: A Julia language wrapper for the standard HEALPix library, allowing Julia users to perform spherical discretization and analysis of cosmological maps.

tools.name: skyviewer
tools.one_line_profile: OpenGL-based HEALPix skymap viewer
tools.detailed_description: An OpenGL-based visualization tool developed by NASA Lambda for displaying and exploring HEALPix-based skymaps stored in FITS format, supporting cosmological data inspection.

tools.name: dorado-scheduling
tools.one_line_profile: Observation planning and scheduling simulations
tools.detailed_description: Simulation tools for planning and scheduling observations for the Dorado mission, handling constraints and optimization for astrophysical data collection. (Predecessor to m4opt).

tools.name: pyRSD
tools.one_line_profile: Redshift-space distortion predictions for galaxy clustering
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for computing accurate predictions of galaxy clustering in redshift-space, modeling Redshift-Space Distortions (RSD) for cosmological inference.

tools.name: gwpv
tools.one_line_profile: Gravitational wave data visualization with ParaView
tools.detailed_description: A tool to visualize gravitational wave data and numerical relativity simulations using the ParaView scientific visualization platform, bridging simulation output with high-fidelity rendering.

tools.name: healpix-python
tools.one_line_profile: Python and C package for HEALPix discretisation
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python and C implementation of the HEALPix pixelization scheme for discretizing the sphere, essential for analyzing CMB and large-scale structure data.

tools.name: Nbody-AI
tools.one_line_profile: N-body simulation and TTV analysis with Machine Learning
tools.detailed_description: A Python package combining N-body simulations with machine learning to compute Transit Timing Variations (TTV) and retrieve orbital parameters, facilitating exoplanet and dynamical analysis.

tools.name: TreeFrog
tools.one_line_profile: Halo Merger Tree builder and catalog comparator
tools.detailed_description: Software for constructing Halo Merger Trees from cosmological simulation snapshots and comparing halo catalogs, essential for studying structure formation and galaxy evolution.

tools.name: MEALPix
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab package for HEALPix
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab implementation of the HEALPix scheme, enabling users in the Matlab environment to manipulate and analyze spherical cosmological datasets.

tools.name: pynbody
tools.one_line_profile: N-body and hydro simulation analysis framework
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python framework for analyzing N-body and hydrodynamic cosmological simulations, supporting various file formats (Gadget, Tipsy, RAMSES) and providing tools for visualization and physical property extraction.

tools.name: topsy
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated visualization for pynbody
tools.detailed_description: A visualization extension for the pynbody analysis package that leverages GPU acceleration to render large-scale N-body and hydrodynamic simulation data efficiently.

tools.name: gaepsi
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization Toolkit for GADGET2 Cosmology Simulations
tools.detailed_description: A visualization toolkit specifically designed for processing and rendering data from GADGET2 cosmological simulations, aiding in the visual inspection of large-scale structure formation.

tools.name: tsne_galzoo
tools.one_line_profile: t-SNE visualization of SDSS galaxies based on morphology
tools.detailed_description: A tool for visualizing Sloan Digital Sky Survey (SDSS) galaxies using t-SNE dimensionality reduction, clustering galaxies based on morphological classifications from the Galaxy Zoo project.

tools.name: DESWL
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts and software tools for Dark Energy Survey (DES) weak lensing analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts and software modules designed to support the weak lensing analysis pipeline of the Dark Energy Survey (DES), facilitating data processing and statistical measurements.

tools.name: clustep
tools.one_line_profile: Initial condition generator for galaxy cluster halo simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that generates initial conditions for galaxy cluster halo simulations, producing output formats compatible with major cosmological simulation codes like GADGET2 and RAMSES.

tools.name: GadgetReader
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for reading GADGET simulation files
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library designed to read and handle output files from the GADGET cosmological N-body/SPH simulation code, facilitating data analysis and post-processing.

tools.name: pg_healpix
tools.one_line_profile: PostgreSQL extension for HEALPix data indexing
tools.detailed_description: A PostgreSQL extension that provides functions for handling HEALPix (Hierarchical Equal Area isoLatitude Pixelization) data, enabling spatial indexing and querying of astronomical datasets within a relational database.

tools.name: cluster_profile
tools.one_line_profile: Galaxy cluster density profile fitting tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for fitting projected density profiles (such as NFW or Beta models) to galaxy cluster member data, used in cosmological structure analysis.

tools.name: sfof
tools.one_line_profile: Friends-of-friends galaxy cluster detection algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A C++/Python implementation of the Friends-of-Friends (FoF) algorithm for detecting galaxy clusters in spectroscopic or photometric redshift space, accounting for redshift-dependent selection effects.

tools.name: nemo
tools.one_line_profile: Millimeter-wave map filtering and cluster detection package
tools.detailed_description: A software package for filtering millimeter-wave maps and detecting galaxy clusters and sources via the Sunyaev-Zel'dovich (SZ) effect, originally developed for the Atacama Cosmology Telescope (ACT).

tools.name: healpix-alchemy
tools.one_line_profile: SQLAlchemy extensions for HEALPix astronomy data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing SQLAlchemy extensions to support HEALPix spatially indexed astronomy data, facilitating the integration of spherical pixelization schemes with ORM-based database workflows.

tools.name: Foldseek
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and sensitive protein structure comparison tool
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics tool that enables fast and sensitive comparisons of large sets of protein structures, facilitating structural alignment and homology search.

tools.name: AstroPaint
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for creating mock maps of astrophysical signals
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to paint astrophysical signal profiles onto halo catalogs to create mock sky maps, useful for verifying analysis pipelines and theoretical modeling.

tools.name: cluster_toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for analyzing galaxy clusters and weak lensing
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing routines for calculating galaxy cluster weak lensing profiles, correlation functions, and other observables from theoretical models.

tools.name: STAARpipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for rare variant association analysis in WGS/WES
tools.detailed_description: An R package implementing the STAAR (Variant-Set Test for Association using Annotation information) pipeline for performing comprehensive association analysis of whole-genome and whole-exome sequencing studies.

tools.name: ytree
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis toolkit for merger trees in cosmological simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for loading, analyzing, and visualizing merger tree data from various cosmological simulation codes (e.g., Gadget, Enzo, RAMSES), integrated with the yt ecosystem.
